name: DOOM: Collector's Edition
summary: Created in conjunction with Triforce, the DOOM Collector's Edition includes an exclusive, fully-realized 12" tall collector's statue of one of DOOM's most iconic demons: the Revenant. Made of high-quality PVC and modeled from actual in-game 3D files, the Revenant stands on an LED-lit base with internal, slow-spinning turbine from the UAC facility on Mars. The DOOM Collector's Edition also includes the highly-anticipated game, packaged in an exclusive metal case.
